scripts.generate: pnpm --filter @forky/api-app swagger:generate && openapi-generator-cli generate -i ../../apps/api/docs/swagger.json -g typescript-axios -o src/generated --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,npmName=@forky/client-api,withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,modelPropertyNaming=camelCase,enumPropertyNaming=UPPERCASE,sortParamsByRequiredFlag=true,ensureUniqueParams=true,nullSafeAdditionalProps=true,apiPackage=api,modelPackage=models && node post-generate.js
